Text: Actually, pal, it is missing around 11 seconds at least, from 1:30 to 1:41 as seen on full version.

helder1965:

Well, all I could see from my end was tiny. But knowing it's only 11 seconds is kind of a relief. I was worried that '08 is almost two minutes shorter than '07.

The dilemma is always "give them damaged or give them nothing". I tried to prepare "the need for right now" gang, and I think it's a decent decision on my part.

For those who waited (or want both) - someone has realized their mistake and I'm posting an undamaged version ... NOW ...

AVIGUY
